metadata.title: CVE-2018-18074 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The Requests package before 2.20.0 for Python sends an HTTP Authorization header to an http URI upon receiving a same-hostname https-to-http redirect, which makes it easier for remote attackers to discover credentials by sniffing the network.

notes.note: sbeattie> python-pip needs to a no-change rebuild to pull in the python-requests update for the copy embedded in python-pip-whl

criterions.comment: requests package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.18.4-2ubuntu0.18.10.1').
